title: Around the AFC in 48 minutes
itunes:title: Around the AFC in 48 minutes
description:
A room filled with heroes - Gregg Rosenthal, Marc Sessler, Chris Wesseling & Patrick Claybon - react to the news of Odell Beckham Jr’s. contract extension (4:00), and break down each AFC team in 3 minutes in 'Around the AFC in 48 minutes’ (11:30) including: is Dolphins HC Adam Gase keeping the right quarterbacks (15:00), Bills poor showing against the Bengals (21:30), can Myles Garrett win Defensive Player of the Year (29:50), will the absence of an elite running back hurt the Colts (41:45), is Blake Bortles bound to struggle following Marquise Lee’s season-ending injury (51:00) and how bad is Kansas City’s defense (1:05:55)?

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
